message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its potential value, I'm proposing a starting price of $950,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and the benefits it offers.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $800,000, which is closer to what I believe the product is worth to me.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value.  To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $900,000.  This offer still reflects the significant value this product holds.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my assessment, I am comfortable moving forward with an offer of $850,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your efforts in finding a compromise. I'm willing to adjust my price to $875,000. This offer balances the product's value with our desire to reach an agreement.
I understand your position, Alice. After careful consideration, I am prepared to offer $860,000 for the product.
